column4: I need help with gimp, i was wondering how you use it to pull out color from a picture once youve made the picture black and white?
you mean you're trying to add color to a black and white image?

not exactly sure the standard way to do this in the gimp but you could make two layers, one with the black and white image and the other with the color image and then edit the mask on one of the layers so you can see the layer below
yw, good luck editing your image
